name: Switch - Black & White
description:
Minimalistic game in the style "Black & White". Game that will test your reaction.

  • Interesting Puzzle
  • Only White and Black colors
  • 51 level
  • Game for any language
  • 1-3 hours of gameplay
  • 100 achievements, to make a phrase on your profile

----------------------------------------------
Settings:
Q - White background, black elements
E - Black background, white elements
R - Restart

----------------------------------------------
